title: Virtual Community of Practice (VCoP)-Based Healthcare Professionals' Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Three or more years of practical experience in the medical field and basic diagnostic competencies
context.additional_context: A blended design combining asynchronous online modules with real-time case discussion workshops in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can derive collaborative problem-solving solutions for at least three complex clinical cases through a Virtual Community of Practice (VCoP).
Learners can explain at least five patient-centered care protocols through online module assessments.
Learners can write practical clinical improvement plans incorporating peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
